intro: Lorostemon negrensis, commonly known as the Negros starflower, is a flowering plant native to the Philippines. It belongs to the family Lamiaceae, which includes many aromatic herbs and shrubs. The plant is characterized by its star-shaped, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of white and purple. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and endangered species.
